divine_euphoria_core.unlock_message: Divine euphoria core ignited! Your pet experiences divine bliss.

transcendent_paradise_engine.name: Transcendent Paradise Engine
transcendent_paradise_engine.description: Engine that creates a transcendent paradise beyond imagination, perfect for enduring titan battles
transcendent_paradise_engine.unlock_message: Transcendent paradise engine online! Your pet exists in pure paradise.

ethereal_bliss_matrix.name: Ethereal Bliss Matrix
ethereal_bliss_matrix.description: Ethereal matrix that generates bliss of the highest order, maintaining morale against titans
ethereal_bliss_matrix.unlock_message: Ethereal bliss matrix deployed! Your pet bathes in ethereal joy.

sublime_serenity_array.name: Sublime Serenity Array
sublime_serenity_array.description: Array that generates sublime serenity and perfect peace, essential for titan battle endurance
sublime_serenity_array.unlock_message: Sublime serenity array activated! Your pet knows perfect peace.

cosmic_jubilation_engine.name: Cosmic Jubilation Engine
cosmic_jubilation_engine.description: Engine that generates cosmic levels of jubilation and celebration, boosting morale for titan warfare
cosmic_jubilation_engine.unlock_message: Cosmic jubilation engine engaged! Your pet celebrates existence itself.

perfect_harmony_conductor.name: Perfect Harmony Conductor
perfect_harmony_conductor.description: Conductor that achieves perfect harmony across all dimensions, balancing pets for titan combat
perfect_harmony_conductor.unlock_message: Perfect harmony conductor synchronized! Your pet exists in perfect balance.

infinite_delight_generator.name: Infinite Delight Generator
infinite_delight_generator.description: Generator that produces infinite delight without end, sustaining pets through endless titan battles
infinite_delight_generator.unlock_message: Infinite delight generator humming! Your pet overflows with endless delight.

celestial_wonder_architect.name: Celestial Wonder Architect
celestial_wonder_architect.description: Architect that designs celestial wonders beyond mortal imagination, inspiring pets for titan warfare
celestial_wonder_architect.unlock_message: Celestial wonder architect deployed! Your pet experiences cosmic amazement.

rapture_transcendence_module.name: Rapture Transcendence Module
rapture_transcendence_module.description: Module that induces transcendent states of rapture and bliss, elevating pets beyond titan fear
rapture_transcendence_module.unlock_message: Rapture transcendence module activated! Your pet transcends mortal limitations.

divine_grace_regulator.name: Divine Grace Regulator
divine_grace_regulator.description: Regulates your pet's state with divine grace and perfection, maintaining optimal condition for titan battles
divine_grace_regulator.unlock_message: Divine grace regulator calibrated! Your pet moves with divine perfection.

omnipotent_comfort_matrix.name: Omnipotent Comfort Matrix
omnipotent_comfort_matrix.description: Omnipotent matrix that provides infinite comfort and joy, sustaining pets through mythic titan warfare
omnipotent_comfort_matrix.unlock_message: Omnipotent comfort matrix activated! Infinite comfort achieved.

eternal_bliss_generator.name: Eternal Bliss Generator
eternal_bliss_generator.description: Generates eternal bliss that transcends all understanding, perfect for enduring mythic titan battles
eternal_bliss_generator.unlock_message: Eternal bliss generator activated! Your pet experiences eternal joy.

infinite_paradise_engine.name: Infinite Paradise Engine
infinite_paradise_engine.description: Engine that creates infinite paradises across all realities, providing sanctuary from mythic titan terror
infinite_paradise_engine.unlock_message: Infinite paradise engine online! Your pet rules infinite realities.

cosmic_ecstasy_array.name: Cosmic Ecstasy Array
cosmic_ecstasy_array.description: Array that generates cosmic ecstasy beyond mortal comprehension, elevating pets above mythic titan dread
cosmic_ecstasy_array.unlock_message: Cosmic ecstasy array activated! Your pet experiences divine ecstasy.

omniscient_serenity_core.name: Omniscient Serenity Core
omniscient_serenity_core.description: Core that knows and maintains perfect serenity across all dimensions, unshakeable even against mythic titans
omniscient_serenity_core.unlock_message: Omniscient serenity core engaged! Your pet knows absolute peace.

universal_jubilation_matrix.name: Universal Jubilation Matrix
universal_jubilation_matrix.description: Matrix that generates jubilation across the entire universe, celebrating victory over mythic titans
universal_jubilation_matrix.unlock_message: Universal jubilation matrix deployed! Your pet celebrates all existence.

perfect_transcendence_conductor.name: Perfect Transcendence Conductor
perfect_transcendence_conductor.description: Conductor that achieves perfect transcendence beyond all limitations, ascending beyond mythic titan reach
perfect_transcendence_conductor.unlock_message: Perfect transcendence conductor synchronized! Your pet transcends all limits.

infinite_delight_overseer.name: Infinite Delight Overseer
infinite_delight_overseer.description: Overseer that governs infinite delight across all realities, ruling over mythic titan despair
infinite_delight_overseer.unlock_message: Infinite delight overseer deployed! Your pet governs infinite joy.

primordial_wonder_architect.name: Primordial Wonder Architect
primordial_wonder_architect.description: Architect that designs wonders from the beginning of time itself, crafting marvels that inspire pets against mythic titans
primordial_wonder_architect.unlock_message: Primordial wonder architect deployed! Your pet experiences creation's wonders.

absolute_rapture_module.name: Absolute Rapture Module
absolute_rapture_module.description: Module that induces absolute rapture beyond all understanding, transcending mythic titan terror
absolute_rapture_module.unlock_message: Absolute rapture module activated! Your pet experiences infinite rapture.

divine_perfection_regulator.name: Divine Perfection Regulator
